politiqueConfidentialiteIntro: We place great importance on protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains what information we collect, how it is used, and your rights regarding this data.
collecteDesDonnees2: We collect only the information necessary to provide and improve our services. This includes, for example, the information you provide when creating an account.
utilisationDesDonnees2: The collected data is used solely to ensure the proper functioning of our application, personalize the user experience, and ensure account security.
vosDroits2: In accordance with applicable legislation, you have the right to access, modify, and delete your data. To exercise these rights, contact us through our support.
